check_box.label: Allow multiple viewers (requires restart)
check_box.name: Allow Multiple Viewers
check_box.tool_tip: Set this so you can use multiple viewers to access Second Life at the same time (requires restart)

check_box.label: Show grid selection at login
check_box.name: ForceShowGrid
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to show and select from all available grids in Second Life - not just the main grid (Agni). You may need permission to access to other grids.

check_box.label: Ask me whether to send crash reports
check_box.name: AskedAboutCrashReports
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to be asked if you want to send a crash report to Linden Labs when you crash

check_box.label: Teleport to wherever you double-click in-world
check_box.name: DoubleClickTeleport
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to teleport to a point you double click on in-world

check_box.label: Walk or run to wherever you double-click in-world
check_box.name: DoubleClickAutoPilot
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to walk or run your avatar to a point you double click on in-world (teleport on double click over-rides this)

check_box.label: Number keys move avatar (when numlock is off)
check_box.name: NumpadControl
check_box.tool_tip: Set this so that the number keys move your avatar when numlock is not set

check_box.label: Disable camera Constraints (move it more freely)
check_box.name: DisableCameraConstraints
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to move your camera beyond it's normal bounds and below land level

check_box.label: Limit the distance that I can select objects at
check_box.name: LimitSelectDistance
check_box.tool_tip: Set this to limit the distance that you can select objects by clicking on them

slider.label: Maximum distance to select objects at:
slider.tool_tip: Indicates the distance away (in meters) up to which you can normally select an object
slider.name: MaxSelectDistance

slider.label: Maximum distance to drag objects in one move:
slider.tool_tip: Indicates the maximum number of meters that an object can be dragged in one movement
slider.name: MaxDragDistance

slider.label: Radius of largest prim to be shown on the Mini-Map:
slider.tool_tip: Radius of largest prim to be shown on the Mini-Map
slider.name: MiniMapPrimMaxRadius

slider.label: Time to delay while pre-caching before showing world:
slider.tool_tip: How long to delay before showing world to you after you show as being online to others (default is 6 seconds)
slider.name: PrecachingDelay
